text: Wonga Philip Harris (June 24, 1904 â€“ August 11, 1995) was an American actor and comedian. As a voice actor he voiced: Baloo in The Jungle Book, Thomas O'Malley the Alley Cat in The Aristocats, Little John in Robin Hood and Patou in Rock-a-Doodle. In 1995, he had a heart attack and later died in Rancho Mirage, California at age 91. title: Phil Harris
